description: VirtualMachineInstanceGuestAgentInfo represents information from the installed guest agent

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

fsFreezeStatus.description: FSFreezeStatus is the state of the fs of the guest it can be either frozen or thawed

fsInfo.description: VirtualMachineInstanceFileSystemInfo represents information regarding single guest os filesystem

items.description: VirtualMachineInstanceFileSystemDisk represents the guest os FS disks

guestAgentVersion.description: GAVersion is a version of currently installed guest agent

hostname.description: Hostname represents FQDN of a guest

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

kernelVersion.description: Kernel version of the Guest OS

machine.description: Machine type of the Guest OS

versionId.description: Version ID of the Guest OS

supportedCommands.description: Return command list the guest agent supports

items.description: List of commands that QEMU guest agent supports

timezone.description: Timezone is guest os current timezone

userList.description: UserList is a list of active guest OS users

items.description: VirtualMachineGuestOSUser is the single user of the guest os
